message: Any other west wing watchers on convore?
Loved it back in the day
Yeah I liked this show a lot.  Especially at the beginning for the first few seasons, and then again at the end with Santos running for prez.
Sorkin's current HBO project is a newsroom show tentatively called 'More As the Story Develops' and is in the pilot phase. I expect a lot of walk and talks. I hope they have a long corridor!
@jschuur That sounds amazing, I can't wait actually

Amusingly enough, in Fringe's alternate universe, The West Wing is still on the air for season 11: http://mralphafreak.wordpress.com/2010/05/14/the-west-wing-with-barack-obama-and-sarah-palin/. Of course, that universe also has thousands of people trapped alive in amber, so there's pros and cons to living there.
I cried like a bitch when Leo McGarry died. I think I was near tears before that when I heard John Spencer died.
Loved tww. Somehow related (also a Sorkin show, starring Bradley Whitford - Josh from tww): Studio 60 on the sunset strip http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0485842/
studio 60 had the same tone as tww, but the subject was so banal
